title: Start
body:
<<setSpeakerName DialogueSwitcher JiYeon>>
I think you're getting the hang of this!
<<setSpeakerName DialogueSwitcher Me>>
Yeah! I hope I can get down this blue diamond trail...
<<setSpeakerName DialogueSwitcher JiYeon>>
I think you will. I believe in you.
Also, I can't believe the beer fairy is real!
<<setSpeakerName DialogueSwitcher Me>>
Yeah! And he/she placed them all over this trail too!
<<BeginGameplay GameManager>>
